Until people come to realize the true import and meaning of counterparty risk... Gold may plunge, but it will be trivial wrt financial assets, particularly scams like this one. The big boys used infinite leverage to bully it down and front run the coming drop in financial assets (as they did with AAPL and anything else that could be considered an investment rather than a float jam trading scam). Now, they can use funny money (AMZN, LNKD and the other FJS stocks) to add to positions in assets that will return value AFTER the adjustment.

Gold is just a solid part of the portfolio for anyone who believes the banks have trillion in losses when forced to mark to market (rising interest rates, declining incomes and speculative buying that still hasn't depleted the shadow inventory) and that the Fed Reserve is the probably most undercapitalized, overleveraged institution in the US...
